description: Thelo Aasgaard scores an injury-time free-kick as Wigan Athletic snatch victory at Stevenage.
title: Stevenage 1-2 Wigan Athletic
maintext:
The frantic finish was in contrast to the first half when they were a lack of clear-cut opportunities.
Those that did exist belonged to Boro with Kane Smith's free-kick fizzed in from the left the best of them, that needing to be beaten away by Sam Tickle.
Wigan's best moment came from Will Goodwin, who curled a chance wide after Tickle's goal-kick had bounced through to him.
He was also booked inside 17 seconds for a foul on Nathan Thompson.
